organizations.name: Blue Ocean Guardians
organizations.description: A nonprofit dedicated to protecting marine life and cleaning up ocean debris through global volunteer programs.

organizations.name: Coastal Care Initiative
organizations.description: Focused on preserving coastal ecosystems and reducing pollution through education, conservation, and restoration projects.

organizations.name: Wave Warriors
organizations.description: An action-driven nonprofit that organizes community beach cleanups and advocates for sustainable ocean policies.

organizations.name: Sea Turtle Rescue Alliance
organizations.description: A dedicated group working to rescue, rehabilitate, and release endangered sea turtles back into the wild.

organizations.name: Reef Restoration Network
organizations.description: Focused on rebuilding coral reef ecosystems through innovative restoration techniques and community engagement.

organizations.name: Ocean Plastic Watch
organizations.description: A global movement tracking and reducing plastic waste in the ocean through science and policy advocacy.

organizations.name: Beach Rescue Volunteers
organizations.description: A grassroots organization organizing volunteers to clean and protect beaches worldwide.

organizations.name: Marine Mammal Protection Society
organizations.description: Working to protect whales, dolphins, and other marine mammals from human threats and habitat destruction. Working to protect whales, dolphins, and other marine mammals from human threats and habitat destruction
